attributes.action: Close schools,colleges and universities until we get this virus under control
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of the virus seeming cases have jumped ever since schools have reopened
attributes.background: Enforce schooling via online means, having a teacher video teach not just Google class room

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
